name: Warriors of the Lost Empire
description:
Hack'n Slash your way through catacombs filled with unspeakable horrors as you seek out the evil plaguing your kingdom. Craft and bind items to create hundreds of unique combinations, including alchemic weapons and stat boosting armor and more. Choose from four distinct characters, each with their own unique attributes, spells and techniques. Seek out friends and tackle the dungeons together in multiplayer mode, all the while swapping items and loot to create even more items, armor and weapons.

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service).
